item.title: 欧洲电视迷发现瑞士法郎最近的飙升令人不快
item.description: 下周，多达 50 万的歌迷将前往巴塞尔参加欧洲电视歌唱大赛，但他们即将发现，瑞士法郎升值所刺激的瑞士物价远非他们的耳朵所能听到的。【原文：As many as half a million fans heading to Basel for the Eurovision Song Contest next week are about to discover that Swiss prices stoked by the franc’s gains are far from music to their ears.】

item.title: 中国 4 月消费通缩扩大，关税造成影响
item.description: 由于美国征收惩罚性关税加剧了国内需求疲软对物价的拖累，中国消费者通货紧缩在 4 月份延续了第三个月。【原文：China’s consumer deflation extended for a third month in April as punitive tariffs imposed by the US add to a drag on prices from weak domestic demand.】

item.title: 全球基金追捧亚洲股市，外汇大涨抵消贸易忧虑
item.description: 全球资金正重新涌入亚洲股市，因为货币飙升和盈利复苏的吸引力抵消了对美国提高关税将削弱该地区经济增长的担忧。【原文：Global funds are piling back into Asian stocks as the attraction of soaring currencies and resilient earnings offsets concern that higher US tariffs will sap the region’s economic growth.】

item.title: 多位美联储发言人表示无意考虑降息
item.description: 在美联储半数以上政策制定者发表公开讲话的这一天，没有一位政策制定者表示美国央行接近降息。【原文：On a day when more than half of the Federal Reserve’s policymakers offered public remarks, not one made it sound like the US central bank was near lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔称欧洲央行需要稳健之手，不能过度降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）说，欧洲中央银行需要一只 "稳定的手"，不能过多地降低借贷成本，因为未来的通胀率可能会更高。【原文：The European Central Bank needs a “steady hand” and mustn’t lower borrowing costs too much as inflation could turn out to be higher in the future, Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel said.】

item.title: 阿根廷在比索汇率压力下停止出售私人债券
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，阿根廷央行在周五交易日中途进行了干预，阻止了 Banco Supervielle 出售美元债券，此举可能会避免比索在平行外汇市场上受到压力。【原文：Argentina’s central bank intervened to stop a dollar bond sale by Banco Supervielle halfway through the trading day on Friday, according to two people with knowledge of the matter, a move that could avert pressure on the peso in the parallel exchange market.】

item.title: 美国官员就卡特尔融资风险会见墨西哥银行家
item.description: 美国财政部的一位官员在未事先通知的情况下访问了墨西哥的年度银行业大会，讨论加强打击有组织犯罪金融活动的问题。【原文：A US Treasury Department official made an unannounced visit to Mexico’s annual banking convention to discuss stepping up efforts to combat organized-crime finances.】

item.title: 特朗普称关税基准为 10%，除非提出 "特殊 "提议
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，他 "总是 "对贸易伙伴征收最低 10%的关税，但很快又补充说 "可能会有例外"，这凸显了美国对正在谈判的数十项贸易协议的态度难以辨别。【原文：President Donald Trump said that he would “always” impose a minimum 10% tariff on trading partners — before quickly adding that “there could be an exception,” underscoring the difficulty discerning the US approach to dozens of trade deals under negotiation.】

item.title: GPB 创始人金泰尔因庞氏骗局获刑七年
item.description: GPB Capital Holdings LLC 创始人大卫-金泰尔（David Gentile）因实施庞氏骗局而被判处七年监禁，该骗局使近 16 亿美元的投资者资金面临风险。【原文：GPB Capital Holdings LLC founder David Gentile was sentenced to seven years in prison for a Ponzi-like fraud scheme that put almost $1.6 billion of investor funds at risk.】

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz 支持的 Omada Health 申请在美国上市
item.description: Omada Health Inc. 申请首次公开募股，以利用这家数字医疗初创企业不断增长的收入和不断缩小的亏损。【原文：Omada Health Inc. filed for an initial public offering that could capitalize on the digital health care startup’s growing revenue and shrinking losses.】

item.title: 西雅图企业以加拿大现金吸引体育迷
item.description: 多年来，多伦多蓝鸟队抵达西雅图都会带来一道熟悉的风景：数以万计的加拿大人兴高采烈地涌入这座城市，为他们的棒球队加油助威。【原文：For years, the arrival of the Toronto Blue Jays in Seattle brought a familiar sight: tens of thousands of exuberant Canadians pouring into the city to cheer on their baseball team.】

item.title: 贝森特称债务限额措施可能在八月用尽
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）告诉美国立法者，财政部使用特殊会计手段以保持联邦债务限额的能力可能会在 8 月份耗尽。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent told US lawmakers that his department’s ability to use special accounting maneuvers to stay within the federal debt limit could be exhausted in August.】

item.title: 墨西哥财政部长称受 USMCA 保护的出口促进经济增长
item.description: 墨西哥财政部长埃德加-阿马多尔（Edgar Amador）表示，尽管美国可能会推动对北美自由贸易协定进行重大修改，但该协定应能继续促进墨西哥经济的发展。【原文：Mexico’s finance chief Edgar Amador said the North American free trade agreement should continue to bolster the economy despite the threat that the US could push for major changes to it.】

item.title: 秘鲁紧急采矿禁令导致黄金产量损失 2 亿美元
item.description: 由于秘鲁北部地区的采矿禁令，秘鲁的黄金产量预计将在下个月大幅下降，该地区的犯罪活动有所上升，最终导致 13 名矿工遇害。【原文：Peruvian gold output is expected to be significantly dented in the coming month due to a mining ban in a northern region of the country that’s seen an up-tick in criminal activity culminating in the murder of 13 mine workers.】

item.title: 华尔街大卷土重来，颠覆了一系列熊市赌注
item.description: 在下跌的深渊中，这一切都很有意义。为您的投资组合筑牢防线，做好防御准备，找一个安全的港口渡过难关。【原文：It all made sense in the depths of the downdraft. Steel your portfolio against calamity, load up on defensive positions and find a safe port to ride out the storm.】

item.title: 摩根大通被新兴市场货币涨势吓了一跳：没有奏效
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布对美国贸易伙伴征收百年来最大幅度关税的当天，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co：看跌新兴市场货币。【原文：On the day President Donald Trump unveiled the steepest tariff hikes for US trading partners in a century, JPMorgan Chase & Co. had a trade idea for clients: Go bearish on emerging-market currencies.】

item.title: 贝恩资本正洽谈以 100 亿美元估值收购 PCI 制药公司
item.description: 知情人士透露，贝恩资本正在洽谈收购 PCI Pharma Services，这笔交易将成为今年最大的私募股权收购交易之一。【原文：Bain Capital is in talks to buy PCI Pharma Services, people with knowledge of the matter said, in a deal that would rank among the year’s largest private equity takeovers.】

item.title: 欧佩克同意大幅增加石油供应，对冲基金看淡石油市场
item.description: 由于欧佩克+同意第二次大幅增产，加剧了对额外供应可能导致全球供应过剩的担忧，对冲基金转而看涨布伦特原油，这是大约六个月来最不看好布伦特原油的一次。【原文：Hedge funds turned the least bullish on Brent crude in about six months as OPEC+ agreed to a second major production increase, inflaming concerns that the extra supply could lead to a global glut.】

item.title: 高盛将关闭 ETF 加速器，将服务转向 Tidal
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. 将关闭其 ETF Accelerator 平台，该平台帮助资产管理公司发行、上市和监督交易所交易基金，并将为容纳约 50 亿美元产品的信托基金提供服务的责任移交给潮汐金融集团（Tidal Financial Group）。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. will wind down its ETF Accelerator platform that helped asset managers launch, list and oversee exchange-traded funds, transferring servicing responsibilities for trusts that house about $5 billion of the products to Tidal Financial Group.】

item.title: 削减开支计划实施后，S&P 上调了加纳的信用评级
item.description: 在新政府公布了控制支出的计划之后，S&P 全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）上调了加纳的信用评级，因为这个西非国家正在从痛苦的债务重组中恢复过来。【原文：Ghana’s credit rating was raised by S&P Global Ratings after the new administration unveiled plans to rein in spending as the West African nation recovers from a painful debt restructuring.】

item.title: Coinbase 考虑并决定反对迈克尔-赛勒的比特币购买策略
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.过去曾受到诱惑，想全面采用迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）推广的比特币购买策略，但认为该计划风险太大。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. was tempted in the past to go all in on the Bitcoin buying strategy popularized by Michael Saylor but considered the scheme too risky.】

item.title: 前 Palantir 顾问将在特朗普的职位上保留 SpaceX 和 OpenAI 的股份
item.description: Palantir 科技公司前顾问雅各布-赫尔伯格（Jacob Helberg）在开始担任唐纳德-特朗普政府的副国务卿时，计划保留对数十家人工智能、国防和金融科技公司的投资。【原文：Former Palantir Technologies Inc. adviser Jacob Helberg plans to retain investments in dozens of artificial intelligence, defense and fintech companies as he starts his tenure as an under secretary of state in Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 被解雇的布鲁克菲尔德风险投资公司负责人称公司要求他向投资者撒谎
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）风险投资部门的前负责人指控该公司在他拒绝向投资者撒谎后错误地解雇了他。【原文：The former head of Brookfield Asset Management’s venture capital arm accused the firm of wrongfully firing him after he refused to lie to investors.】

item.title: 加纳债务负担因经济扩张而大幅下降
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）表示，随着经济的扩张和政府在债务危机后控制支出，加纳的债务负担将在今年大幅减轻。【原文：Ghana’s debt burden will ease sharply this year as the economy expands and the government reins in spending after a debt crisis, Barclays Plc said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织不顾印度反对批准向巴基斯坦支付 10 亿美元
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）执行董事会周五批准向巴基斯坦发放约 10 亿美元的贷款，在该国与邻国印度的冲突不断恶化的情况下，缓解了该国脆弱的财政状况。【原文：The International Monetary Fund’s executive board on Friday approved a roughly $1 billion loan disbursements to Pakistan, bringing some relief for the nation’s fragile finances amid its worsening conflict with neighboring India.】

item.title: 交易员通过投资避险 ETF 为滞胀做准备
item.description:
一篮子避险 ETF 上个月吸金 130 亿美元，创 2023 年 10 月以来新高

。【原文：

A basket of haven ETFs took in $13 billion last month, the highest since October 2023

】

item.title: 沃什认为美联储关税言论暗示信誉受损
item.description: 凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）被视为下一任美联储主席的可能竞争者，他表示，如果美国央行不能防止与关税相关的价格上涨导致通胀持续上升，那么美国央行就会犯错。【原文：Kevin Warsh, who is seen as a possible contender to be the next Federal Reserve chair, suggested the US central bank would be at fault if it cannot prevent tariff-related price hikes from leading to a persistent rise in inflation.】

item.title: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼从高盛、戴维斯-波尔克和 BPI 聘请员工
item.description: 美国联邦储备局局长米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）即将成为负责监管事务的副主席，据熟悉内情的人士透露，她已经向银行界推荐了三名工作人员人选。【原文：US Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman, who’s on track to become vice chair for supervision, has turned to the banking world for three staff picks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Sonos 临时首席执行官称公司已转危为安，他希望获得最高职位
item.description: Sonos公司临时首席执行官汤姆-康拉德（Tom Conrad）表示，在软件问题造成的挫折之后，这家音频公司已经 "转危为安"，他希望被永久任命为首席执行官。【原文：Sonos Inc. interim Chief Executive Officer Tom Conrad said the audio company has “turned the corner” following setbacks caused by software issues — and that he wants to be named to the top job permanently.】

item.title: 花旗集团认为收益率曲线有 "急剧 "恶化的风险
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. strategists recommend betting on longer-term bonds to underperform, citing the risks of what they call an “expensive” fiscal bill.】
